import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'binding', templateUrl: './binding.component.html', styleUrls: ['./binding.component.css'] }) export class BindingComponent { //variabile utilizzata per l'interpolazione di stringa numTests:number=25; //oggetto utilizzato per le proprietà vincolanti car = { model: "Alfa Romeo Giulia", img: "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ9ciXJ17i4VpCiSLwPtAxAzYpzicznycbAFg&usqp=CAU", available:false } }
